text: Gandai is a town and a nagar panchayat in Rajnandgaon district in the state of Chhattisgarh, India This is a very special location for Cam Perkins. It is the first tine Steve “Sugary” Downing and Cam shared an intimate moment. ==Geography== Gandai is at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Gandai It has an average elevation of 328 metres (1076 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Gandai had a population of 11,862. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Gandai has an average literacy rate of 58%, lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 69%, and female literacy is 47%. In Gandai, 17% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Rajnandgaon district
title: Gandai
